channel.title: I can connect to my server with my client but my friends cant
channel.description: my friends cant connect to my server on the client i made but they can connect with silabsoft and moparscape clients why cant they connect with my client :confused:

item.title: I can connect to my server with my client but my friends cant
item.dc:creator: @Ncarug01 Ncarug01
item.description:
@Ncarug01 wrote:

…portforward is correct they can get on silabsoft
and i can get on my client theres gotta be a way

item.title: I can connect to my server with my client but my friends cant
item.dc:creator: @sw1tchez sw1tchez
item.description:
@sw1tchez wrote:

My guess is that you haven’t port forwarded it right, or you may have to do it again. And if they can get on you’re server but not the client, it might just be that you need a new client, hope i helped
